title: Puzzle Competition
question_text: In a puzzle competition, competitors are given a different puzzle to solve for each round. The first round presents a puzzle known to be normally distributed with a solution time of $\mu = 3\text{ minutes}$ and $\sigma=0.4\text{ minutes}$ . The fastest $20\%$ of competitors advance to the next round. To the nearest tenth of a minute, what cutoff score will advance a competitor to the next round?
